# ZergNet

## Example

### Basic

```html
<amp-embed
  width="780"
  height="100"
  heights="(max-width:645px) 100%, (max-width:845px) 31%, 23%"
  layout="responsive"
  type="zergnet"
  data-zergid="42658"
>
</amp-embed>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration semantics, please contact the ad network or refer to their documentation.

Supported parameters:

-   `data-zergid`
